title: Bayou Drama: A Collection of Stories from the Bayou City
description: Inspired by Zane and Carl Webber, I have created a collection of stories dealing with life, love, and faith in relationships in the Bayou City. The characters relate to us all in one way or another challenged in this crazy game of love and relationships. It will make you laugh, it will make you cry, but most important it will make you think...What would I do if I was in this situation?
author: Darine Davis
